about_the_game:
Math Path Builder

Challenge yourself at generated levels that get harder and harder.
The goal is simple: Connect the path from the origin to all goals, but the numbers need to add up!

  • Every level has exactly one start position.
  • You have one or many goal positions which exact value you need to reach.
  • You can guide a path from the start to each goal.
  • The path can split.
  • Use numbers or modifiers to reach the goals value.
  • Mathematic operations are always done in sequence.

The game includes a rudimentary online rank which simply tells you which global rank you have based on your highest completed level.
It is best played in a small window.
No accounts needed, no advertisements or in-game purchases.
The game is completely free. Enjoy!
